thread.title: SFC bans Ko Shu Chuan for six years (SFC - Securities and Futures Commission)
thread.title_full: SFC bans Ko Shu Chuan for six years (SFC - Securities and Futures Commission) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: SFC bans Ko Shu Chuan for six years (SFC - Securities and Futures Commission)
text: ( Source : SFC - Securities and Futures Commission ) The Securities and Futures Commission (SFC) has banned Ms Ko Shu Chuan from re-entering the industry for six years from 15 October 2015 to 14 October 2021. The disciplinary action follows an
